entries: {@bold {@italic Extra Abilities.}} Body emits acid and +1d4 acid damage

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) acid damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 11}). Until this grapple ends, Elgos can't use its tentacles on another target.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: Ergok can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Corrosive Form
entries: A creature that touches Elgos or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 4 ({@dice 1d8}) acid damage. Any nonmagical weapon made of metal or wood that hits Elgos corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to −5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal or wood that hits Elgos is destroyed after dealing damage.
Elgos can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical wood or metal in 1 round.
